answers.author: Barbara DeLeon
answers.text:
Las Cruces, NM has a population of just over 100k and a budget of $260M.  We have a budget office with four analysts and one manager.  They coordinate the annual budget process which typically kicks of in Dec/Jan and goes through May when Council adopts.  They also generate operating reports, develop projections, track external economic conditions and process budget adjustments throughout the year.

Fremont, CA has a population of 220,000 and a total budget of $200 million.  We have a budget manager, financial analyst, and three accountants who coordinate department budgets. answers.author: Paul Brown
answers.text:
Savannah, GA has about 140k population-daytime population (tourists and commuters) of close to 200k, with an all funds budget of just under $300 Million.  We have a budget director, assistant director, 4 analysts, special project coordinator, and a system specialist.  The analysts each handle one or more of the City's 8 bureaus, with the more senior personnel handling additional funds such as Capital Improvement and Risk Management.  The system specialist maintains the budgeting software, provides training to user departments, compiles and formats the budget document, and provides administrative support to the director.  The special projects coordinator oversees City grants to local Social Service agencies and other projects.  The budget director plays a role in policy development with the CM and CFO, and the assistant oversees day to day operations.

author: Leslie Beauregard
text:
I am looking for some comparisons of staffing in other budget offices - Charlottesville has a population of about 45K with an annual GF budget of $150M.  Our roles and responsibilities can be found at www.charlottesville.org/budget.  I am very interested in how many staff other similar budget offices have and their roles.  We do both budgeting and performance management in our office currently will two full time staff, including myself as Director.
Thanks!
title: Staffing in Budget Offices
